hero.html: I love web development!This is a template for a simple portfolio. I decided to use it to showcase a few Udacity courses I've taken and some teaching work, but you can use it to showcase any kind of project that you want the world to see :) Contact me: me@email.com

content.pContent: I made my own version of 2048. How cool is that!?
Making mobile apps isn't so hard after all.
